page_header.title: About Us
page_header.description: Enhancing the quality of life for Deaf individuals in Howard County.

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Serve and represent the Deaf Community in Howard County.
Develop a solid partnership with the government of Howard County.
Build relations between hearing and Deaf constituents in Howard County.

resources.title: Our Resources
resources.description: We provide a comprehensive list of resources to support the Deaf community.

items.name: Gallaudet University
items.description: Higher education for the deaf and hard of hearing.

legal.description: HCADeaf is classified by the IRS as a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization.
